product_name: Sierra Designs Stow Windshirt Jacket - Women's
long_description: Ultralight yet functional, the women's Sierra Designs Stow Windshirt Jacket protects you from the wind and resists light rain while it charms with gathers and contoured seams, all at only 3.5 oz. Windproof ripstop nylon features a durable water repellent finish as well as a polyurethane clear coat, so light precipitation beads up and rolls off. Stowable hood and pack-compatible hand pockets make this jacket more functional than other ultralight wind shells. Sweat vapor moves outward through the fabric; mechanical stretch provides high mobility. Elastic cuffs and drawcord hem seal out wind. Jacket stows in 1 hand pocket for convenient carry. Sierra Designs Stow Windshirt Jacket for women has a trim cut to fit over a base layer and light mid layer.
short_description: Ultralight yet functional, the women's Sierra Designs Stow Windshirt Jacket protects you from the wind and resists light rain while it charms with gathers and contoured seams, all at only 3.5 oz.
